summary: This document is an email chain from April 22, 2020, involving attorneys and staff from Edwards Pottinger LLC discussing the submission of a financial agreement form for therapy for an Epstein victim. It references prior communication and an FBI/OVS form related to victim services.

persons.name: Brittany Henderson
persons.context: Trial attorney at Edwards Pottinger LLC corresponding about paperwork for an Epstein victim's therapy and referencing an FBI/OVS form.

persons.name: Maria Cardenal
persons.context: Paralegal at Edwards Pottinger LLC who is sending the financial agreement form for therapy completion for an Epstein victim.

connections.description: Attorney and paralegal working together at Edwards Pottinger LLC on victim-related paperwork.

events.title: Email correspondence about victim therapy paperwork
events.description: Email chain discussing the submission of a financial agreement form for therapy for an Epstein victim and referencing an FBI/OVS form.

events.title: Prior application submission
events.description: Reference to an attached application submitted earlier for victim therapy approval.

keyFacts: Attorneys from Edwards Pottinger LLC are handling paperwork related to therapy for an Epstein victim.
The correspondence references an FBI/OVS form related to Epstein victims, indicating interaction with victim services programs.
A financial agreement form for victim therapy needed completion and submission.
The email chain shows ongoing legal support for victims in 2020, years after Epstein's death.
